title: Attarintiki Daredi
summary: Attarintiki Daredi (transl.â€‰Which path leads to my aunt's house?) is a 2013 Indian Telugu-language action drama film written and directed by Trivikram Srinivas. The film stars Pawan Kalyan, Samantha and Pranitha Subhash while Nadhiya, Boman Irani, and Brahmanandam play supporting roles.
